name: toothily
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
If you smile toothily, you show a lot of teeth when you smile: He smiled toothily as the girl approached. The child grinned toothily up at his father from the pushchair.
More examplesFewer examplesShe giggled toothily as she recalled the incident.You rarely see him attending celebrity parties or smiling toothily for the cameras.He plays the toothily sinister leader of a criminal gang planning a jewel heist."I'm thinking that I might run for president," he joked, grinning toothily.
